## cu config set

Set a configuration value

### Synopsis

Set the value of a specific configuration setting.

```
cu config set <key> <value> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for set
```

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.config/cu/config.yml)
      --debug           enable debug mode

```
